summary: The young, naive Smitty is sent to prison for six months; Cathy, his girlfriend, watches as he disappears behind the bars and barbed wire. He's assigned a cell with Queenie, a balls-out ... See full summary »
cast: Wendell Burton|Michael Greer|Zooey Hall|Danny Freedman|Lee Broker|James Barron|Lázaro Pérez|Jon Granik|Tom Harvey|Hugh Webster|Kirk McColl|Vance Davis|Robert Goodier|Cathy Wiehl|Georges Allard|Modesto|Michel Gilbert|Robert Saab|A. Zevtouman
title: Los ojos de la cárcel
